item.title: Progressively Balanced Multi-class Neural Trees
item.description: Mentor: Dr. Prithwijit Guha (Dept. of EEE, IIT Guwahati) Collaborator: Spoorthy Bhat This project was my Bachelor’s thesis at IIT Guwahati. The basic idea is to allow each node to learn oblique partitions in the input space as opposed to the axis-aligned partitions learned by a standard C4.5 tree.
